item.description: AWGG - Breaking Out Of Jail So, you end up in a shell, and you realize you’re stuck in jail. What do you do now? You break out of course! Step 1: Enumeration The first thing you’ll want to do is basic enumeration. Start finding what binaries you have access to while “locked up”. At the very LEAST you’ll have access to shell one-liners, but any compilers, interpreters, or packages for other languages (gcc, python, lua, node, etc.

A Wolf Gal’s “Getting Started” Guide to RF Hacking for Dummies: More and more people are wondering where I get my kit from, especially people wanting to break into infosec, so I’m putting this together to hopefully give some basic recommendations for intro wireless pentesting equipment. This is NOT a comprehensive list, nor is it the be-all-end-all of equipment either, but rather some tools I’ve used in my day-to-day doing wireless audits.
